verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holiness unto the Lord, unto the King.
Holiness unto Your name, I will sing.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holiness unto Jesus, holiness unto You, Lord.
Holiness unto Jesus, holiness unto You, Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I love You, I love Your ways, I love Your name.
I love You, and all my days, I'll proclaim
